name: Fadau
description:
Simple point & click Javascript game made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 48.
The theme of the game is to dig as deep as possible by unlocking new levels underground. It doesn't take a long time to complete the game so that it doesn't get too boring and long. As it was made only in 3 days, it is not so developed, but I hope it will be fun to play anyway.
